function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misleading articles about coronavirus prevention","Impact":"Increased spread of inaccurate information leading to ineffective prevention measures","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and verification of information, education on reliable sources","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, information verification platforms","People":"General public, people seeking information on coronavirus prevention","Owner":"Fact-checking organizations, information providers"},{"Description":"Excessive reliance on non-affiliated and non-peer reviewed sources","Impact":"Dissemination of unverified or inaccurate information","Mitigation":"Promotion of peer-reviewed and reliable sources, education on source evaluation","Technologies":"Source evaluation tools, educational campaigns on reliable sources","People":"General public, content sharers on social media","Owner":"Educational institutions, media organizations"},{"Description":"Disproportionate sharing of inaccurate information on social media platforms","Impact":"Misinformation influencing public behavior and preventive measures","Mitigation":"Promotion of accurate information, implementation of fact-checking mechanisms on social media platforms","Technologies":"Algorithmic content verification, fact-checking plugins","People":"Social media users, content creators","Owner":"Social media platforms, fact-checking organizations"}]}
